Features.Harvesting.SpeedMultiplier.Desc: Change the speed at which the player harvests grass with a scythe. Acts as a direct multiplier. Min: 0.0, Max: 2.0, Default: 1.0.
Features.Harvesting.ModMenu.lblDescripti: Provides an easier way for players to harvest grass, with a scythe.
Features.Harvesting.ModMenu.lblSpeedMult: Determines the multiplier to apply to the speed of using the scythe
